thread.title_full: 5 Emotional Naruto Moments That'll Leave You In Tears - Comicbook.com

title: 5 Emotional Naruto Moments That'll Leave You In Tears - Comicbook.com
text:
5 Emotional Naruto Moments That'll Leave You In Tears Megan Peters Start Slideshow Slide of 
If you are a fan of Naruto , then you know the long-running franchise has had its fair share of sad moments. If anything, there have been too many grief-inducing scenes, and fans of the show have likely blocked out some of the worst offenders. After all, the show does tell the story of an ostracized and orphaned ninja whose biggest dream in life is to be accepted by his village. 
Seriously, how could it not be sad? 
This year, fans will see the franchise close another chapter as Naruto: Shippuden finally comes to a close after years on air. If you want to remind yourself of some of the show’s most tragic moments, then ComicBook.com will make the trip easier for you. We’ve counted down five of the most emotional scenes from recent years, so you better get your tissues ready. (Photo: Studio Pierrot )
